en.title: Buy Used Equipment
en.desc: You can save 30-50% on quality gear from reputable stores like KEH or MPB.

en.desc: Learn its limits before buying expensive ones. Good lighting is more important than expensive glass.

en.q: How much should a beginner spend?
en.a: For beginners, $500–800 is sufficient for a good camera body, kit lens, and basic accessories.
Start with a decent camera body and lens. Add more gear gradually as you grow.
